title: (x) Finding flava font - Phoenix Sans {David H}
content:
![Flava Sample](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023010610im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/39765.jpg)   
   
Hi there,   
   
I found this font some months ago and want to use in a client job. Unfortunatly I can't remember where I found it / downloaded it from to check licensing restrictions etc.   
   
I was wondering if it looked familiar to anyone or if you knew where it came from / who made it etc.   
   
(The font file is called ' flava ' and the download file was named ' Macintosh TrueType.sit ' if that helps at all!?)   
   
Thanks for your help!   
Cheers,
author: susannah

comments.content:
I am not too sure about the name, but the font itself is from Utopia Fonts, if I remember correctly ( The creators of world famous 'Loki Cola' )..   
   
_( Sad, but true, the 'Utopia' site seems to have disappeared from the web, in the recent past.. )_

Finally, Hmm, minutes later.. I found it.. ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023010610im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)   
Its called ' [Phoenix Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023010610/http:/www.channel42.net/dale/portfolio.asp?page=phoenix-sans)', and it, sure, has been created by [Dale Harris](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023010610/http:/www.channel42.net/dale/) / Utopia Fonts..

Hey David,   
   
Fantastic!   
   
Thanks so much for your help. Much appreciated!   
   
:o)   
   
Cheers,   
Susannah.

I always can't help but notice the similarities with   
 [Sibylle Hagmann](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023010610/http:/www.emigre.com/Bios.php?d=14)'s 5-year old [Cholla](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023010610/http:/www.emigre.com/dp/getfontpage.php?PChoWi.html). ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023010610im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)
